flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: H.O. Electric is your residential Electrical Specialist. We are an electrical contracting company providing homeowners the best electric repair service in (Waltham – Lincoln). This family owned establishment shows up on time and in uniform, and most jobs can be completed the same day. They offer upfront pricing, meaning that you will know the price of the job before the work begins. If you're looking for residential electrical service or electrical repair in the (Waltham – Lincoln), MA area and are interested in scheduling an appointment with this electrical company, please call us at: 617-489-6324. http://hoelectric.com
